full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
W168A-22MK05: Portable Toilet Rentals

## Reference Number
WS3516826686-Doc3518766660

## Amendment Number
3

## Solicitation Number
WS3516826686

## Publication Date
September 14, 2022

## Tender Closing Date
October 19, 2022, at 2:00 PM CDT

## Expected Contract Start Date
November 14, 2022

## Expected Contract End Date
November 13, 2025

## Tender Status
Expired

## Procurement Category
Services (SRV)

## Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

## Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## End-User Entity
Department of National Defence (DND)

## Contact Information
Matthew Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)
matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14104926?extsite=MTQxMDQ5MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND), Garrison Wainwright, located in Denwood, Alberta, has a requirement for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision and servicing of portable toilets, human waste barrels, and hand wash stations. The RISO will be used on an "as and when required" basis.

## Important Notes

* Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 19, 2022, at 2:00 PM CDT.
* All bids submitted after 2:00 PM CDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

## Trade Agreements
The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
